## hpr3215 :: Why I Gave Away a 3-D Printer

 Ken Fallon asked for shows abut 3-D printers and I told him I had given mine away. So of course he asked for a show about why I had done that. This is that show.

https://olfconference.org/
https://2021.penguicon.org/
https://canonical.com/
https://www.vmware.com/
https://www.redhat.com/en/authors/joe-brockmeier
https://enablingthefuture.org/
https://www.zwilnik.com/why-i-gave-away-a-3-d-printer/
